sections.title: Structure

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section provides details on the AGK gene, making it a candidate for the inclusion of a relevant infobox about the gene/protein.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Every article should start with an infobox to quickly convey important details, especially in technical articles about genes or proteins.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The absence of an initial infobox indicates no adherence to this standard.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The beginning of the article doesn't feature any infoboxes, thus failing to meet this imperative standard.

sections.meta_notes: The section is rich in specific technical information but would benefit significantly from the inclusion of an infobox to highlight major points succinctly and improve the accessibility of information.
